a: Yiuacademy is a marketplace and online learning portal for kids aged 2 till 22. We help parents find great classes for their kids. And we help teachers to promote their classes to parents. We offer both recorded video classes and live classes from teachers
We offer both recorded video classes and live classes from teachers. Live classes include live meetings over video zoom or google meet.

q: How does the class timings for online classes work ?
a: There are predefined timings for onine classes. If it doesn't work for you, please request for a new timing. We will try to accomodate it for you.
